title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 325-1.12 - Termination of emergency status
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 325-1.12 - Termination of emergency status

State Regulations

The physician in attendance in public hospitals must be
the judge as to when the "emergency status" of the case has terminated. In case
of a dispute, the matter shall be referred to the compensation board of the
medical society of the county in which the hospital is located for immediate
decision. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
325-1.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
